categories: Category:Songs by Boba Fett and the Assassin Droids

nodes.text: "Who Cares (If Freedom's Gone)?" was a Core Drive song by the band Boba Fett and the Assassin Droids. The track, published as a single, was available in the galaxy in the period of time between the years 0 ABY and 4 ABY. The song was deemed to contain an anti-Imperial message by the Imperial Board of Culture, and it was banned as a result.

"Who Cares (If Freedom's Gone)?" was mentioned in the 1993 supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game titled Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim. The guide was written by Simon Smith and Eric Trautmann.
